verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Slowly, slowly, walk the path, And you might never stumble or fall Slowly, slowly walk the path, And you might never find love at all

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Golden golden is her hair Like the mornin' sun, o'er the fields of corn Golden, golden flows her love, So sweet, and clean, and warm

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lonely, lonely, is the heart That ne'er another can call it's own Lonely, lonely is the heart That has to live all alone

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Wildly, wildly, beats the heart With a rush of love like a mountain stream Wildly, wildly, play your part As free as a wild bird dreams
